titleStmt.title: The Parliaments resolvtion concerning the volvntiers that are to bee raysed throughout the whole kingdome under the command of his excdlency [sic] the Earle of Essex likewise how Docter Bastwick was taken by the cavaleers and how wickedly he was handled by them.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
